DataElement.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Clinical Study Participation Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: an indicator related to participation in a clinical study of a dental professional practice.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Clinical Study Participation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to participation in a clinical study of a dental professional practice.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.:Health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.
Health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients.

Property.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research. :Taking part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
The act of taking part in an activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
